name: Adrenaline Shot
text: Recycle 1. Mastery: Volley 2.

name: Heavy Arrow
text: You may pay 2 stamina to increase the damage this attack deals by 6.

name: Intuition
text: When you play a defense card, you may recycle this card from your hand.

name: Backflip
text: You can only play this card after a red card. The next time you refill your hand, draw 1.

name: Precision Draw
text: Assist. At the start of your turn, if this card is the top card of your discard pile, draw 2.

name: Cover Fire
text: Assist. When another player would suffer attrition damage, you may discard this card from your hand to prevent that damage.

name: Prompt Reflexes
text: Draw 1.

name: Decoy
text: Choose a player to draw 1.

name: Swift Deflection
text: When you discard this card from your hand, draw a card.

name: Graceful Defense
text: Reduce the stamina cost of each defense card you play this turn by 1.

name: Lightning Escape
text: Search your discard pile for a defense card and add it to your hand.

name: Sneaky Glide
text: Recycle 1. The next card you play in your sequence gains stealth.

name: Sharp Shot
text: Mastery: The next time you play a red card this turn, deal 2 damage per weapon level.

name: Accurate Shot
text: Assist.

name: Rapid Burst
text: Assist. Volley 2.

name: Long Range
text: The next red card you play in your sequence gains stealth. While this card is the top card of your discard pile, prevent any attrition damage you would suffer.

name: Ranged Position
text: Assist. While this card is the top card of your discard pile, it counts as a defense card in your sequence for the attrition check.

name: Targeted Shot
text: Mastery: The next time you play a red card this turn, draw 1.

name: Evasion
text: Draw 2.

name: Acrobatics
text: Mastery + Volley: Draw 3 and then you may immediately move without paying any stamina cost.

name: Bouncing Shot
text: When you discard this card from your hand, perform volley 2.

name: Silent Arrow
text: Stealth. While you are the aggro player, you cannot play this card in your sequence.

name: Deadly Shot
text: Increase the damage this attack deals by 5 per weapon level. Mastery: If this attack deals damage, inflict blind.

name: Blinding Shot
text: Stealth. If the previous card in your sequence has aim, inflict blind.

name: Combined Assault
text: Recycle 1. When a player plays red-red, you may discard this card from your hand to inflict blind.

name: Hail of Arrows
text: Finisher. Discard X cards from the top of your deck. Deal your base weapon damage for each red card discarded this way.

name: Open Target
text: When you reveal cards from your hand to deal damage as part of a stun resolution, you may reveal this card as if it were red-red.

name: Paralyzing Arrow
text: Increase the struggle this maneuver removes by X (max: 5). If you pay 5 for this card, stun the monster.

name: Precision Shot
text: Assist. Stealth. Increase the damage this attack deals by 2 per weapon level for each card with aim in your discard pile.

name: Refill the Quiver
text: Shuffle all red cards from your discard pile into your deck. Mastery: You may shuffle your entire discard pile into your deck instead.

name: Retreat Shot
text: Perform volley 2 or recycle 1. Opening: Prevent any attrition damage you would suffer this turn.

name: Waiting Game
text: At the start of the round, you may reveal this card from your hand to become the last player in player order. If you do, you may recycle any number of cards.

name: Double Shot
text: Red + Green: Increase the damage this attack deals by 3 per weapon level.

name: Infinite Blast
text: Assist. Recycle 1 up to three times.

name: Shielded Position
text: If you suffer attrition damage this turn, reduce that damage by 1 per weapon level and remove 1 struggle.

name: Flash Arrow
text: Discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a red card, you may play it as the next card in your sequence without paying its stamina cost.

name: Lateral Jump
text: When you play a blue card in your sequence, you may discard this card from your hand to immediately move without paying any stamina cost.

name: Arrow Snatch
text: When you play a red card, you may recycle this card from your hand.

name: Take Aim
text: Stealth. Search your discard pile for a card with aim and add it to your hand.

name: Final Reckoning
text: Finisher. Remove 1 struggle and increase the damage this attack deals by 1 per weapon level for each red card in your discard pile.

name: Midair Shot
text: Stealth. When you discard this card from your hand, deal your weapon damage.

name: Persistence
text: Recycle 1. When you discard this card from the top of your deck, add it to your hand.

name: Second Chance
text: Discard any number of cards from your hand and then draw up to your hand size limit.

name: Dancing Arrow
text: Assist. Volley 2. This card is considered to be both blue and red.
